revisions.rev:
{{Infobox cricket tournament | name = 2010â11 Standard Bank Pro20 | image = | imagesize = | caption = Standard Bank Pro20 | administrator = [[Cricket South Africa]] | cricket format = [[Twenty20]] | tournament format = [[Round-robin tournament|Round-robin]] and [[Single-elimination tournament|knockout]] | host = {{flagcountry|South Africa}} | champions = [[Cape Cobras]] | count = 2 | participants = 6 | matches = 20 | attendance = | player of the series = | most runs = [[Owais Shah]] (Cape Cobras) (293) | most wickets = [[Makhaya Ntini]] (Warriors) (11) | website = [http://www.espncricinfo.com/rsadomestic-2010/content/series/469356.html CricInfo] | previous_year = 2009â10 | previous_tournament = 2009â10 Standard Bank Pro20 | next_year = 2011â12 | next_tournament = 2011â12 Standard Bank Pro20 }} The '''2010â11 Standard Bank Pro20''' was the eighth season of the [[Standard Bank Pro20 Series]], established by the [[Cricket South Africa]]. The series was played between [[January 28]] and [[March 13]] [[2011]]. ==Venues== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !Stadium !City !Capacity !Home team |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[Newlands Cricket Ground|Newlands]] |[[Cape Town]]||25,000 || [[Cape Cobras]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[Kingsmead Cricket Ground|Kingsmead]] |[[Durban]]||25,000 || [[Dolphins cricket team|Dolphins]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[OUTsurance Oval]] |[[Bloemfontein]]||20,000 || [[Knights (cricket team)|Knights]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[De Beers Diamond Oval]] |[[Kimberley, Northern Cape|Kimberley]]||11,000 || [[Knights (cricket team)|Knights]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[Wanderers Stadium|New Wanderers Stadium]] |[[Johannesburg]]||34,000 || [[Highveld Lions cricket team|Lions]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[Senwes Park]] |[[Potchefstroom]]||9,000 || [[Highveld Lions cricket team|Lions]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[SuperSport Park]] |[[Centurion, Gauteng|Centurion]]||20,000 || [[Titans cricket team|Titans]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[St George's Oval|St George's Park]] |[[Port Elizabeth, Eastern Cape|Port Elizabeth]]||19,000 || [[Warriors (cricket team)|Warriors]] |- |style="text-align:left;"|[[Buffalo Park]] |[[East London, South Africa|East London]]||15,000|| [[Warriors (cricket team)|Warriors]] |} ==Rules and regulations== The tournament is divided into a group stage and a knockout stage. In the group stage, teams face each other in a single [[round-robin tournament]]. At the end of the group stage, the top four teams qualify for the semi-finals. The semi-finals are best-of-three playoffs, with the top seed facing the fourth seed and the second seed facing the third seed. If a match in the knockout stage ends with a tie, a [[Super Over]] will determine the winner. The winners of the semi-finals play a single final match to determine the winner of the tournament. For each group stage match, the host of the match alternates between tournaments. Each team hosts either two or three of their five matches. In the knockout stage, the higher seed hosts the second and third (if required) matches while the lower seed hosts the first match. Points were awarded as follows in the group stage: {| class="wikitable" |+Point system |- !Result!!Points |- | Win, with bonus point || 5 points |- | Win, without bonus point || 4 points |- | Tie || 3 points |- | No result || 2 points |- | Loss || 0 points |} * The team that achieves a [[run rate]] of 1.25 times that of the opposition shall be rewarded one bonus point. * A team's run rate will be calculated by reference to the runs scored in an innings divided by the number of overs faced. * Points are deducted for slow over rate at 1 point per over not completed within the allotted 90 minutes.{{cite web |url=http://www.standardbank.co.za/site/pro20/rules.html |title=Standard Bank Pro20 Series â playing conditions |publisher=Standard Bank |accessdate=2011-02-12 }} ==Teams and standings== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;border:none;" |- ! Team !width="20"|{{Tooltip | Pld | Played}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | W | Won}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | L | Lost}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | NR | No result}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | BP | Bonus points}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | Pen | Penalties}} !width="20"|{{Tooltip | Pts | Points}} !width="50"|{{Tooltip | NRR | Net Run Rate}} |- style="background:#cfff88;" | align="left" | '''[[Dolphins cricket team|Dolphins]]''' | 5 | 4 | 1 | 0 | 0 | 0 | '''16''' | â0.110 |- style="background:#cfff88;" | align="left" | '''[[Titans cricket team|Titans]]''' | 5 | 3 | 2 | 0 | 1 | 0 | '''13''' | +0.640 |- style="background:#cfff88;" | align="left" | '''[[Cape Cobras]]''' | 5 | 3 | 2 | 0 | 0 | 0 | '''12''' | +0.135 |- style="background:#cfff88;" | align="left" | '''[[Warriors (cricket team)|Warriors]]''' | 5 | 3 | 2 | 0 | 0 | 0 | '''12''' | â0.073 |- style="background:#ffcccc;" | align="left" | '''[[Highveld Lions cricket team|Lions]]''' | 5 | 1 | 3 | 1 | 0 | 1 | '''5''' | â0.107 |- style="background:#ffcccc;" | align="left" | '''[[Knights (cricket team)|Knights]]''' | 5 | 0 | 4 | 1 | 0 | 0 | '''2''' | â0.698 |} :
(C) = Eventual champion; (R) = Runner-up.
:
Note: The winner and runner-up qualified for the [[2011 Champions League Twenty20]].{{cite web |url=http://www.espncricinfo.com/rsadomestic-2010/engine/series/469356.html?view=pointstable |title=Points Table {{!}} South African Domestic Season 2010/11 |publisher=CricInfo }}
